body: I noticed the same behaviour in 14.6
i was thinking about that was only my wrong setup I should reopen?
Yeah, but it would be nice to know how you got to that state.

I have syncthing-gtk and one day shudently stoped working

sry cant be more specific... :(

I have reinstalled and startover and works fine
sry can't reproduce it any more...

thx

Reinstall does not fix this for me on this system. I'm not sure what caused this. This config worked earlier in the week, was running `v0.14.x` (Don't recall the exact one)

Tested occuring with: 
- v0.14.5
- v0.14.6
- v0.14.7

so as the panic says, it's a bug, but it's not obvious how it's happening.
If you can reliably repro this, then run with STTRACE=all env var set and provide logs.

```
.
├── cert.pem
├── config.xml
├── https-cert.pem
├── https-key.pem
└── key.pem
```

Runs fine. Rescans everything and syncs caught back up.

I still have copies of the other files, though no clue how to anonymize them to provide them to you.
You can't really annonimize that part sadly but I don't think we need it, I have a hunch of what the issue is.
Well, then I'm sure I'll still have them if you need a tester.

Good question. We never remove entries from this index, so it would have to come from a new index entry not having been written correctly. The `smallIndex` writes out its stuff outside of a transaction, so perhaps there is a condition where a stop or crash at the wrong time will leave us with index data for files but no folder mapping for it. Tricky to recover from though other than dropping that index data though...

Just an update with the "broken" config folder. I have no idea if this is/will continue to be helpful for \<you\>, so if not let me know.
